title: Weather App
description: Weather app has been a popular project to add to many devs' portfolio. In this challenge, you will work with an API to get current weather of a location.

userStories.content: Create a weather app that matches the given design.
By default, user can see weather of a location (you can choose a location). Alternatively, it could use current location of the user.
Users can see temperature, location, time, wind, high/low temperature, weather status of the selected location.
Users can see temperature of the upcoming 24 hours with 3 hours interval.
Users can see forecast of the next 5 days with weather status and low/hight temperature.
Users can see summary weather of large city such as New York, Copenhagen or Ho Chi Minh City (you can choose 3 cities of your choice).
Users can choose to display temperature in celsius or fahrenheit.
Users can search for a city and see its weather.
Deploy the solution and submit Repository URL and Demo URL.
